rev.comment: /* Honours */ this hardly qualifies as an honour. Hart may have put Lenin on his personal list, but Hart's opinions carry no official weight

rv spamming. the material added is subject to a dispute on [[Talk:Criticisms of communism]]. please do not spam disputed material until the concerns of all parties have been addressed.
All the statements are referenced and none has been shown to be false. Added two-verion template
oh, the information on the famine is correct - your way of presenting it, however, and your insistence on blaming Lenin are POV
